title: Parque Bolívar
description: A European-style park in Sucre, featuring a miniature replica of the Eiffel Tower and a large playground.

title: Parque Cretácico
description: A dinosaur-themed park adjacent to the Cal Orck'o paleontological site, showcasing life-sized dinosaur models and thousands of fossilized footprints.

title: Mercado Central de Sucre
description: A bustling market offering a variety of fresh produce, local delicacies, and traditional crafts.

title: Iglesia de La Merced
description: A historic church known for its baroque architecture and significant religious artworks.

title: Cathedral Basilica of Our Lady of Peace
description: A neoclassical cathedral located in Murillo Square, notable for its baroque elements and historical significance.

title: La Rufina Restaurant
description: A renowned restaurant that elevates traditional Bolivian street food to fine dining, recognized by the 50 Best Discovery list.

title: Huayna Potosí
description: A popular mountain for climbers, offering challenging ascents and breathtaking views of the Cordillera Real.

title: Salar de Uyuni
description: The world's largest salt flat, known for its vast white expanse and mirror-like surface during the rainy season.
